name: Space War: Gravity
description:
Space War is the space arcade game ! Fly through the space and destroy waves of attacking aliens! Be prepared for the final battle!

Try to eliminate the enemy ship as much as you can to have more health, fire speed, shield and bomb

There are three game modes (Easy, Medium and Hard), and the goal of the game is to get as many lightyear points as you can before the end of the game.

What do you waiting for? Start your spaceship engines and join to this ultimate galactic space war game.

Excellent graphics and sound effects make the game astonishing.

Simple and intuitive controls.

This game contain ads to support development.

"How-to-play

1. Operations: Touch continuously screen to move the plane, it is easy to dodge enemies' bombing by clicking bottom part of your device;

2. Props: click to the corresponding prop button to use its effects;

3. Get energy: energy got can be used to strength you weapons in equipment stock;

4. Equipment upgrade: select the plane, upgrade weapons and Equipment ;

5. Recovery: after plane recovery, your score will continuously increase;
